settings.quote_text: In case you need to be reminded, love yourself first.

settings.title: Liberté is making luxury lingerie for diverse bodies.
settings.text: Our founder, Amber Tolliver, started Liberté because she couldn’t find lingerie in her size that made her feel confident. When she realized other women faced the same challenge, she set out to make a change. At Liberté, our goal is to is provide chic, supportive, and comfortable lingerie for the modern women, who is less concerned with conforming—and more interested in loving who she is. We are committed to inspiring confidence through our high-quality, beautifully-crafted collections. Our timeless designs use natural and tech fabrics to ensure breathability and comfort to provide women who wear niche sizes the lingerie they deserve (but rarely receive). Using Amber’s background in the fashion industry as a foundation,  Liberté was built with a deep understanding of the lingerie industry, what could be better and what needed to be overhauled.

settings.title: Meet the founder
settings.text: A former fashion student, lingerie model, and frustrated 32E bra shopper, Amber Tolliver is the founder of Liberté, a luxury lingerie brand made for the modern woman. With an extensive 17 year career as a standard and plus-size model, Amber  has worked for numerous lingerie brands and was also the face of Aerie’s “Real” campaign in 2013. Garnering accolades for being a relatable inspiration to young women, her work as a model ultimately fueled her desire to create a brand that meet the needs of women who were ignored by the traditional American lingerie market. Most important to Amber  is shifting the perspective of what is possible in bra manufacturing by providing size inclusive collections, in comfortable and beautiful styles women deserve. Raised just outside of Chicago and former student of Columbia College Chicago and FIT, Amber  lives in New York City. In addition to running Liberté, she is actively involved with Girls Inc. of New York and is a dedicated plant mom.

settings.collection_text_description:
Lingerie that fits like it was made for you, because it was.

Liberté creates bras that are both beautiful and supportive in sizes 32C to 38H. Designed to adapt to your curves and comfortable enough for everyday wear, our lingerie is meant to help you feel your best. Liberté intimates are produced in NYC with lace, mesh, and jersey knits from Italy.

settings.title: Breathable Comfort, Tailored to You
settings.text: Our functional lingerie is made to move with you. It’s comfortable enough for busy Mondays (or lazy Sundays).

settings.title: Liberté
settings.subtitle: Lingerie that fits like it was made for you

settings.title: DD+ Bras
settings.content: Liberté creates bras that are both beautiful and supportive in sizes 32C to 38H. Designed to adapt to your curves and comfortable enough for everyday wear, our lingerie is meant to help you feel your best. Liberté intimates are produced in NYC with lace, mesh, and jersey knits from Italy.

settings.title: What are the available shipping methods?
settings.subtitle:
- Shipping is free for all domestic orders over $100

- Orders ship via USPS First Class Mail, Monday through Friday

settings.title: When will my order ship?
settings.subtitle:
- Orders ship next business day after order is placed

- Items are expected to arrive 5-7 days after order is place within the contiguous U.S.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.subtitle:
- All returns must be requested within 30 days of shipment to receive a full refund. 

- To be eligible for a return, items must have the original tags, be unworn, be unwashed, and be free of perfume, make-up and deodorant. 

- Panties are final sale and can not be returned

- Items that do not meet the highest standards of health and hygiene are not eligible for credit and will be returned to sender.
- Gift cards are final sale and do not qualify for return or exchange.

Read our full Returns policy here.

settings.title: How do I return an item?
settings.subtitle:
- To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

- To return your product, please mail your product with receipt to the following address using a prepaid, insured, and traceable shipping method:

Liberté
447 Broadway, 2nd Fl #144, New York, NY 10013

- You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item.

- Shipping costs are non-refundable.

- Please use a trackable shipping service or purchase shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

settings.title: How do I exchange a product for a different size or color?
settings.subtitle:
If you would like to exchange a product, please return the original item for a full refund and place a new order to secure your new size.

If you need to exchange a defective or damaged item, please send us an email at contactus@liberte.co and send your item to:

Liberté

447 Broadway, 2nd Fl #144

New York, NY 10013

settings.title: Why is it important to wear bras with the proper fit?
settings.subtitle: At Liberté we believe what you wear underneath your clothes matters. A properly fitting bra is comfortable, provides support to reduce back pain and improve posture, and instills confidence so you can feel your best.

settings.title: How do I determine my bra size?
settings.subtitle: Your bra should feel like freedom. You can use our bra size calculator to make sure you're wearing the right size.

settings.title: Where is Liberté Lingerie made?
settings.subtitle:
- Liberté lingerie is designed and manufactured in NYC.

- Our garments are crafted with lace and fabrics from Italy.

settings.title: Do you offer plus size bras?
settings.subtitle: - Our current size range is 32C to 38H.

settings.title: How should I care for my lingerie to make it last longer?
settings.subtitle:
- Hand wash your bra in a delicate detergent, and rinse with cold water.

- Keep in mind, detergent, bleached, and heat can destroy elastic and lace.

- Always air dry your bra.

- If you're not a hand wash type of girl make sure your delicates are in a lingerie wash bag to protect them but we don't recommend this

settings.title: FAQs
settings.subtitle: Need Extra support? We're here to help.

settings.title: Contact
settings.content: For all Liberté related questions please email us, or see our Frequently Asked Questions Page.

settings.subtitle:
contactus@liberte.co
447 Broadway, 2nd Fl #144
New York, NY 10013
